### Standardised mean difference (SMD)

$$
\text{SMD} = d = \frac  {m_{1} - m_{2} } {sd_{pool}} 
$$

$$
sd_{pool} = \sqrt{\frac{(n_{1} - 1)sd^2_{1} + (n_{2}-1)sd^2_{2}}{n_{1} + n_{2} -2}}
$$

$$
var({d}) =\frac{1}{n_{1}} + \frac{1}{n_{2}}  + \frac{d}{2(n_{1} + n_{2})}
$$
## Mean difference

$$
\text{MD} = m{1} - m{2}
$$

$$
var(\text{MD}) = \frac{sd_{1}^2}{n_{1}} + \frac{sd_{2}^2}{n_{2}} = se_1 + se_2
$$
### Mean

$$
\text{Mean} = \bar{x}_{i}
$$

$$
var(\text{Mean}) = \frac{sd^2}{n}
$$
### Proprition

$$
\text{Proportion} = p = \frac{y}{n}
$$


$$
var(p) = \frac{p(1-p)}{n}  = \frac{y(n-y)}{n^3}
$$


### log response ratio 


$$
\ln\text{RR} = \ln \left( \frac{m_{1}}{m_{2}} \right) = \ln{m_{1}} - \ln{m_{2}}
$$
$$
v(\ln\text{RR}) = \frac{s_{1}^2}{n_{1}m_1^2} +  \frac{s_{2}^2}{n_{2}m_{2}^2},
$$


### slope difference

$$
\text{SD} = slope_{1} - slope_{2}
$$

$$
var(\text{SLD}) = se_{slope_1} +  se_{slope_2}
$$


### intercept difference

$$
\text{ID} = int_{1} - int_{2} (= \ln\text{RR})
$$
$$
var(\text{ID}) = se_{int_1} +  se_{int_2}
$$
